data.eml:eml: Description of a new Fridericia species (Oligochaeta: Enchytraeidae) and its molecular comparison with two morphologically similar species by PCR­RFLP

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dózsa-Farkas, K., Cech, G. (2006): Description of a new Fridericia species (Oligochaeta: Enchytraeidae) and its molecular comparison with two morphologically similar species by PCR­RFLP. Zootaxa 1310: 53-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173857
